title: Nil dereference panic in dialer

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

labels.name: skip-changelog
labels.description: Bugs that have never been in a released stable version, and as such excluded from the release notes

body:
```
Panic at 2020-02-26T12:45:00+01:00
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x18 pc=0x92d33e]

goroutine 74 [running]:
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/dialer.(*dialerConn).Close(0xc000ee0060, 0xc00318c180, 0x110a780)
	<autogenerated>:1 +0x2e
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/osutil.TCPPing(0x111d1e0, 0xc000454080, 0xc000b68ea8, 0x14, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/home/ckellermann/src/playground/syncthing/lib/osutil/ping.go:26 +0x1d2
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/osutil.GetLatencyForURL(0x111d1e0, 0xc000454080, 0xc000b68ea0, 0xc7, 0x575ea59, 0x0, 0x0)
	/home/ckellermann/src/playground/syncthing/lib/osutil/ping.go:39 +0x94
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/relay/client.relayAddressesOrder(0x111d1e0, 0xc000454080, 0xc000e66000, 0x10a, 0x200, 0xc000e66000, 0x100, 0x200)
	/home/ckellermann/src/playground/syncthing/lib/relay/client/dynamic.go:162 +0x47c
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/relay/client.(*dynamicClient).serve(0xc000130690, 0x111d1e0, 0xc000454080, 0xc0000a3180, 0x7ff863e00008)
	/home/ckellermann/src/playground/syncthing/lib/relay/client/dynamic.go:79 +0x75f
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/relay/client.newCommonClient.func1(0x111d1e0, 0xc000454080, 0x0, 0x0)
	/home/ckellermann/src/playground/syncthing/lib/relay/client/client.go:62 +0x81
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/util.(*service).Serve(0xc0004612c0)
	/home/ckellermann/src/playground/syncthing/lib/util/utils.go:247 +0x142
created by github.com/syncthing/syncthing/lib/connections.(*relayListener).serve
	/home/ckellermann/src/playground/syncthing/lib/connections/relay_listen.go:56 +0x141
```

#6363 

Because it returns a non-nil conn on error that is nonetheless nil internally, and other code does the wrong thing.
